title: Longest Palindromic Substring
algorithmDescription: Find longest palindromic substring using expand around center technique
detailedDescription: Find longest palindromic substring in given string. Input: A string. Output: The longest palindromic substring (if multiple, any one). Use expand around center: for each position, expand outward while characters match. Consider both odd and even length palindromes.
hints: Each character can be center of odd-length palindrome
Each pair of adjacent characters can be center of even-length palindrome
solutionApproach: For each index i: expand around i (odd-length) and around i,i+1 (even-length). While characters match, expand outward. Track longest palindrome. Return substring with max length.
testCaseCriteria: Must find correct longest palindrome. Should handle both odd and even length. O(n²) time acceptable.
